CustomField.description: Auto-categorizes opportunity into Pure Software, AI-Enabled Services, or Legacy Services based on Product Lines.
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "Multiple (BL Review)"), "Mixed", IF( (IF(OR( INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Contracting - Technology"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Compliance - Technology"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Platform - Sigma"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Platform - Litigation"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Platform - Insights"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "FDE - Custom AI Solution")), 1, 0) + IF(OR( INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Contracting - Managed Services"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI M&A - Managed Services")), 1, 0) + IF(OR( INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "Other - Managed Service"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "Contracting - Secondee"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "Other - Secondee")), 1, 0)) > 1, "Mixed", IF(OR( INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Contracting - Technology"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Compliance - Technology"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Platform - Sigma"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Platform - Litigation"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Platform - Insights"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "FDE - Custom AI Solution")), "Pure Software", IF(OR( INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI Contracting - Managed Services"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "AI M&A - Managed Services")), "AI-Enabled Services", IF(OR( INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "Other - Managed Service"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "Contracting - Secondee"), INCLUDES(Product_Lines_Multi__c, "Other - Secondee")), "Legacy Services", "Undetermined")))))
CustomField.label: Product Bucket
